fields.summary: Android: calling finish in the current activity won't kill the app

comments.body: Since tabgroup is a heavyweight window with it's own activy and create a JS context, Ti.Android.currentActivity refers to the main activity and not the TabGroup window activity. The TabGroupActivity can be accessed by calling tabGroup.getActivity().
Closing ticket as invalid with reference to the above comments.
